Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 off 53, which will surely go down as the greatest T20 innings he has played to date
India were down and out at 31 for 4 in the seventh over but managed to pull off a miraculous win
Kohli's calculation to take Rauf on in the penultimate over gave India a fighting chance with 16 needed off the final over
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's innings, calling it the best he has played for India
Babar Azam gave credit to Kohli and the Indian team for their win
Virat Kohli said he has no idea how the match happened and credited Hardik Pandya for keeping him calm
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have now won only two of their last eight matches against India
India will now head to Sydney to play the Netherlands, while Pakistan will fly to Perth to regroup and face Zimbabwe
